4.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

58.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

29.movie_plot: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

162.movie_plot: A woman gets involved in an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the sex games they play, so the relationship begins to get complicated.

112.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

139.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

135.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

87.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

1.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

164.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

64.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

120.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

167.movie_plot: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

104.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

24.movie_plot: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hit man who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

148.movie_plot: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

113.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

131.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

52.movie_plot: Watch the story of history's greatest gladiator unfold with graphic violence and the passions of the women that love them. This is Spartacus.

98.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

25.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

156.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

184.movie_plot: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette.

19.movie_plot: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

93.movie_plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

51.movie_plot: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

3.movie_plot: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

127.movie_plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

95.movie_plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.

21.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

180.movie_name: Double Life of Veronique, The (La Double Vie de Véronique) (1991)
180.movie_plot: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

134.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

108.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

124.movie_plot: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

146.movie_plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

54.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

101.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

159.movie_plot: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

32.movie_plot: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

182.movie_plot: A dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a live TV variety show.

89.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

71.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

116.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

166.movie_plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.
